episodes.synopsis: Under a wide blue sky in a bright yellow rapeseed field, a young woman burns herself to death. Later, a former politician is found brutally murdered.
episodes.title: Sidetracked

episodes.synopsis: A taxi driver is brutally killed by two young girls who seem to lack a motive for their actions; a man dies of a heart attack in Ystad's main square.
episodes.title: Firewall

episodes.synopsis: Three teenagers in 18th-century fancy dress are shot dead in a secluded wood and lie undiscovered for two months.
episodes.title: One Step Behind

episodes.synopsis: Wallander investigates the slaying of an elderly couple at a farmhouse. A leak of the wife's dying words leads to an outbreak of racist reprisals.
episodes.title: Faceless Killers

episodes.synopsis: When a friend's father is murdered, Wallander initially refuses to get involved, but subsequent events convince him that there is more to the case.
episodes.title: The Man Who Smiled

episodes.synopsis: A bird watcher falls to his death. In an apparently unconnected case, a man disappears. Soon Wallander believes he's on the trail of a serial killer.
episodes.title: The Fifth Woman

episodes.synopsis: Wallander moves into a dream home with his new girlfriend. But his happiness is shattered when the skeleton of a girl is discovered in the garden.
episodes.title: An Event in Autumn

episodes.synopsis: After two Eastern European corpses wash ashore on a raft in Ystad, Wallander travels to Latvia on a hunt for the killers.
episodes.title: The Dogs of Riga

episodes.synopsis: A friend of Wallander's daughter begs for his help but then disappears. Meanwhile, an elderly woman's body is found cremated in a shallow grave.
episodes.title: Before the Frost

video.title: Wallander
video.synopsis: In a picturesque and once-peaceful province of Sweden, disillusioned police inspector Kurt Wallander probes a shocking spate of baffling murders.
